Key Match Events: Virat Kohli scored 76 runs off 59 balls
Hardik Pandya took 3 wickets for 20 runs
Axar Patel scored 47 runs off 31 balls and took 1 wicket for 49 runs
Jasprit Bumrah took 2 wickets for 18 runs
Heinrich Klaasen scored 52 runs off 27 balls
David Miller scored 21 runs off 17 balls
Post-Match Reflections: Virat Kohli was awarded Player of the Match
Virat Kohli said nothing in post match interview, but the player of the match award was given to him
Miscellaneous Highlights: India won the 2024 ICC Men's T20 World Cup
Jasprit Bumrah was awarded Player of the Series
The match was played on June 29, 2024, at Kensington Oval, Bridgetown, Barbados
Others: The match was a 20-over match, the toss was won by India who elected to bat first
The match was played between India and South Africa in the ICC Men's T20 World Cup
